turn.2: Pondoland cannibal snail The Pondoland cannibal snail, scientific name "Natalina beyrichi", is a species of medium-sized predatory air-breathing land snail, a carnivorous terrestrial pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the family Rhytididae.
turn.4: This species is endemic to South Africa.
turn.6: Its natural habitat is temperate forests.
turn.8: It is threatened by habitat loss.
turn.10: It is called "cannibal" because it preys on other snails.
